title: [學嘢交流] 墨西哥姊妹抗議女性暴力示威

replies.msg:
08/03 #MexicoCity #Mexico - Hundreds of thousands of women took to the streets to protest against violence and for women’s rights and clashes with police forces.

Women in black masks and armed with hammers smashed and overturned police cars, threw petrol bombs and burnt doors of government buildings. More than 60 people were injured.

Activists said they attended to show outrage over a wave of femicides in Mexico, which have risen 137% over the past five years. According to official figures, Mexico recorded 1,006 femicides in 2019.

Violence against women in Mexico is the ultimate expression of the decadence of the capitalist system. Wage slavery under the current system takes an even cruder form for women; if capitalism represents submission, exploitation, and violence for the working class in general, for women workers, it is a double burden.
真女權份子
